com.coveros.selenified.output

Class OutputFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.coveros.selenified.output.OutputFile

  • public class OutputFile
extends Object
    Test Output A custom generated output file outputFile.recording all actions taken
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Max Saperstone
